name: Unwind (Glenn McClelland)
description:
Game for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

Theme: Rewind

HOW TO:

- Defeat enemies by either Fuzz Bombs or by the Time Cassette rewinding to 0.

- Earn Fuzz Bombs by defeating enemies.

- Time Cassette Rewind can be started as soon or as late as you want.

- Enemies play for as long as the Time Cassette did during the Setup Phase.

- You have 1 minute in the Setup Phase before the Time Cassette rewinds itself.
